servicesIntro.title: Our Services
servicesIntro.subtitle: Comprehensive digital solutions for your business
servicesIntro.description: From concept to deployment, we provide end-to-end development and design services.

services.title: Custom Website Development
services.description: Modern, responsive websites built with the latest technologies. Fast, secure, and scalable solutions.

services.title: Web Applications
services.description: Complex web applications with custom functionality. Full-stack development with modern frameworks.

services.title: Mobile App Development
services.description: Cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native or Flutter.

services.title: Desktop Applications
services.description: Native desktop applications for Windows, macOS, and Linux using Electron or Tauri.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: User-centered design that creates intuitive and engaging digital experiences.

services.title: Logo Design & Branding
services.description: Complete brand identity design including logos, color schemes, and brand guidelines.
